subject: Re: [junit] How Junit will test all assert methods, even if one or more assert methods fails in a TestCase?
msgSnippet: ... I too agree. Seems evident from the above line :-) ... Perhaps inexperience in writing to lists for help :-) and definitely not a cultural difference !!
messageBody:
>
> > Expecting your immediate reply with solution.
>
> You're expecting quite a bit, there.
I too agree. Seems evident from the above line :-)

> Perhaps a cultural difference, but I find it impolite to expect someone to
> hand you an immediate reply with a solution, so I have handed you an
> immediately reply with the way to find the solution.
Perhaps inexperience in writing to lists for help :-) and definitely not a
cultural difference !!

Regards,

Rajesh Acharya
Infoglyptic Software Pvt. Ltd.
Bangalore. INDIA.

intelligent, but the one most responsive to change."
